title: Implement NPS Calculator
description: Implement the NPS (National Pension System) calculator with current age, monthly investment, expected return, annuity rate. Shows corpus at 60, lumpsum withdrawal (60%), annuity (40%), and monthly pension. See PRD.md for formula and specifications.

title: Add overflow handling to prose code blocks
description: Long formulas in calculator info section code blocks may overflow on mobile. Add overflow-x-auto to code blocks.

title: Add KVP (Kisan Vikas Patra) Calculator
description: Calculate maturity amount and doubling period for Kisan Vikas Patra investments.

title: Add patterns to donut chart for color-blind users
description: DonutChart segments differentiated only by color. Color-blind users struggle to distinguish. Add patterns or labels. Violates WCAG 1.4.1.

title: Increase Switch touch target to 44x44px
description: Switch component in components/ui/switch.tsx is only 18.4px tall x 32px wide. Mobile users (70%+ traffic) will misclick. Violates WCAG 2.5.5. Need padding wrapper or increased base size.

title: Make ResultCard text size responsive
description: ResultCard main value always text-3xl (30px). May overflow on ultra-narrow screens. Use text-2xl sm:text-3xl.

title: Add Capital Gains Tax Calculator (LTCG/STCG)
description: Calculate LTCG and STCG tax on equity, mutual funds, and real estate. Include indexation benefits where applicable.

title: Add ARIA labels to slider components
description: Slider components in components/ui/slider.tsx lack aria-label, aria-labelledby, and aria-valuetext attributes. Screen reader users cannot understand slider values. Violates WCAG 1.3.1, 4.1.2.

title: Add aria-describedby to switch toggles
description: Calculator switch descriptions not programmatically associated. Screen readers announce switch but not description. Add aria-describedby linking.

title: Add TDS Calculator
description: Calculate Tax Deducted at Source for various income types - salary, interest, rent, etc.

title: Implement Lumpsum Calculator
description: Implement the Lumpsum calculator for one-time investments with investment amount, expected return, time period, and year-by-year growth breakdown. See PRD.md for formula and specifications.

title: Extract SWPBreakdownTable to separate file
description: SWPCalculator.tsx has inline component definition (lines 49-133) that prevents React.memo optimization. Extract to separate file.

title: Improve RelatedCalculators text handling
description: RelatedCalculators truncate cuts off long titles on mobile. Use line-clamp-2 or allow wrap for better information display.

title: Optimize logo asset
description: public/logo.png is 20KB at 887x338, displayed at 40px height. Create SVG or optimized smaller PNG to save bandwidth.

title: Add focus management to expandable tables
description: BreakdownTable doesn't manage focus when toggling 'Show More'. Screen reader users may lose context. Move focus to newly revealed content.

title: Increase button default touch target
description: Button default h-9 (36px), sm variant h-8 (32px) are below 44px target. Use lg variant on mobile or increase base sizes.

title: Add Inflation Calculator
description: Calculate future value of money and purchasing power erosion over time.

title: Add Cost of Delay Calculator
description: Show the impact of delaying investments - how much corpus is lost by starting late.

title: Implement PPF Calculator
description: Implement the PPF (Public Provident Fund) calculator with yearly investment (₹500-₹1,50,000), 15-year minimum lock-in, government interest rate. See PRD.md for formula and specifications.

title: Fix DonutChart tooltip for dark mode
description: DonutChart tooltip in components/calculator/DonutChart.tsx uses hard-coded backgroundColor "#ffffff" and border color. In dark mode, tooltip is nearly invisible. Need to compute CSS variable values at runtime.

title: Implement SIP Calculator
description: Implement the SIP (Systematic Investment Plan) calculator with monthly investment inputs, expected return rate, time period, and year-by-year breakdown table. See PRD.md for formula and specifications.

title: Increase slider thumb touch target
description: Slider thumb in components/ui/slider.tsx is size-4 (16px), below 44px minimum. Increase to size-6 or verify Radix hit area expansion.

title: Fix slider thumb hard-coded white background
description: Slider thumb in slider.tsx uses bg-white regardless of theme. Use bg-background for dark mode compatibility.

title: Add React.memo to DonutChart
description: DonutChart in components/calculator/DonutChart.tsx re-renders on every parent state change. Recharts SVG re-render causes stuttering. Wrap export with React.memo().

title: Fix heading hierarchy in calculator info sections
description: Multiple h2 elements without proper section wrapping in calculators. Screen reader navigation less predictable. Violates WCAG 1.3.1.

title: Add Gratuity Calculator
description: Gratuity calculator using formula: (15 × last drawn salary × years of service) / 26. For employees with 5+ years of service. Inputs: last drawn salary (basic + DA), years of service.

title: Add skip link for keyboard navigation
description: No "Skip to main content" link in Header. Keyboard users must tab through header on every page. Violates WCAG 2.4.1. Add visually-hidden skip link.

title: Verify primary color contrast ratio
description: Primary #10B981 on #FAFAFA background is ~4.3:1 ratio, borderline WCAG AA (4.5:1 required). Verify usage context; use darker primary-dark for critical text.

title: Create responsive table pattern for mobile
description: BreakdownTable with 5 columns overflows on phones <640px. Users must horizontal scroll. Create vertical stack pattern or add scroll indicator on mobile.

title: Add Retirement/FIRE Calculator
description: Calculate retirement corpus needed based on current expenses, inflation, life expectancy. Includes FIRE planning with withdrawal rates.

title: Add URL update debouncing to calculators
description: All 9 calculator components call router.replace() on every input change without debouncing. Causes lag on rapid slider adjustment. Add 300-500ms debounce with setTimeout.

title: Add Suspense boundaries to calculator pages
description: All 9 calculator page.tsx files render client components without Suspense fallback. On slow 3G/4G networks, users see blank screen during hydration. Add loading skeleton wrapper.

title: Cache OG image font at Edge
description: OG routes fetch Noto Sans from Google on every request, adding 100-500ms latency. Cache font at Edge or inline base64.

title: Add SCSS (Senior Citizens Savings Scheme) Calculator
description: Calculator for Senior Citizens Savings Scheme with current 8.2% interest rate, 5-year tenure.

title: Standardize max-width across pages
description: Homepage uses max-w-5xl, calculators use max-w-4xl/max-w-3xl. Visual discontinuity when navigating. Pick consistent value.

title: Fix PPF Calculator blue color tokens
description: PPFCalculator.tsx:156-159 uses blue-200, blue-600 instead of design tokens. Inconsistent with emerald/indigo system. Replace with primary/20, primary tokens.

title: Add SSY (Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana) Calculator
description: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana calculator for girl child savings. 8.2% interest rate, 21-year maturity, ₹250 min to ₹1.5L max per year. Tax-free under 80C. Inputs: child age (0-10), yearly deposit, current interest rate.

title: Add Mutual Fund Returns Calculator
description: Calculate absolute and CAGR returns from purchase and current NAV values.

title: Extract Recharts colors to theme-aware pattern
description: DonutChart has hard-coded COLORS = { invested: "#10B981", returns: "#6366F1" }. Colors don't respect theme changes. Use CSS variable references or getComputedStyle.

title: Add Stamp Duty Calculator
description: Calculate stamp duty and registration charges for property by state. Different rates for men/women.

title: Implement FD Calculator
description: Implement the FD (Fixed Deposit) calculator with principal, interest rate, tenure, and compounding frequency options (monthly, quarterly, half-yearly, yearly). See PRD.md for formula and specifications.

title: Replace or lazy-load Recharts (200KB bundle)
description: DonutChart imports full Recharts library (~200KB) for single PieChart. Causes 1-2s extra load on 3G. Evaluate lighter alternatives (Visx, custom SVG) or use dynamic import.

title: Add Income Tax Calculator (Old vs New Regime)
description: Compare tax liability under Old vs New tax regime for FY 2025-26. Include deductions (80C, 80D, HRA, etc.) for old regime. Show which regime saves more tax. Complex but highest search volume calculator in India.

title: Add EPF (Employee Provident Fund) Calculator
description: Employee Provident Fund calculator. Includes employee (12%) and employer (12%) contributions, with 8.25% current interest rate. Inputs: basic salary, current EPF balance, retirement age. Shows year-by-year growth.

title: Add Goal Planner Calculator
description: Reverse SIP calculator - given target amount and timeline, calculate required monthly SIP.

title: Fix BreakdownTable key fallback to index
description: BreakdownTable.tsx:51 falls back to array index when periodKey undefined. Use composite key for proper DOM reconciliation.

title: Make logo responsive
description: Header logo fixed at h-10 (40px) all breakpoints. Use h-8 sm:h-9 md:h-10 for better mobile proportions.

title: Add step-up feature to SIP calculator
description: Add annual step-up (top-up) percentage option to SIP calculator. Step-up SIP increases the monthly investment by a fixed percentage each year, reflecting typical salary growth. Requires updating calculation logic to handle yearly increasing contributions and updating the UI with a step-up percentage input slider.

title: Implement EMI Calculator
description: Implement the EMI calculator for home, car, and personal loans with loan amount, interest rate, tenure inputs, and amortization schedule. See PRD.md for formula and specifications.

title: Remove deprecated share fallback
description: Calculator share buttons create/remove textarea for clipboard fallback using deprecated execCommand. Modern browsers support navigator.clipboard; remove fallback.

title: Centralize OG image color constants
description: 9 OG image routes have scattered hex colors. Create shared COLORS constant object for consistency and maintainability.

title: Add HRA (House Rent Allowance) Calculator
description: House Rent Allowance exemption calculator. HRA exempt = minimum of (actual HRA, rent - 10% basic, 50% basic for metro / 40% for non-metro). Inputs: basic salary, HRA received, rent paid, city type.

title: Make DonutChart height responsive
description: Chart always h-64 (256px), takes 38% viewport on iPhone SE. Use h-48 sm:h-56 md:h-64.
